name: OMP
about: OMP是由OMP链、OMP应用程序和OMP链上的数字资产组成的基础公共链。它是一个全面的区块链应用支付系统，集成了支付转账、数字资产交易、NFT转账、市场报价和区块链浏览器等功能。
abount_en: OMP is an underlying public Chain consisting of OMP Chain, OMP App, and digital assets on the OMP Chain. It is a comprehensive blockchain App payment system that integrates the functions of payment transfer, digital asset transaction, NFT transfer, market quotation and blockchain browser.
